comments:
Follow the steps exactly as outlined below:

- Start your workbench (if you already have it up, then restart it)
- Go to the profile launch configuration
- Double click "External Java Application"
- Switch to the main tab and point to the path of the class that is attached to this report
- Go to the monitor tab and select "Execution Time Analysis"
- Click Profile
- Press enter in the console until the program exits
- Open the workspace log file (Window > Show views > Other... > PDE Runtime > Error Log

Notice the error log entry with the following stack trace:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.agentcontroller.internal.stream.SharedMemoryCircularBufferInputStream.close(SharedMemoryCircularBufferInputStream.java:116)

at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLEntityManager.closeReaders(Unknown Source)

at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(Unknown Source)

Set to 4.3 w/o iteration for bug triaging.
Not containable in 4.3 and retarget to 4.4. Please let me know if you have any concern.
Retarget to future due to resource limitation.
Hi Bing. I have transferred my bugs to you for triage. Thanks.
